thread.title: Jewish group talking ‘foolishness’ on Holocaust
thread.title_full: Jewish group talking ‘foolishness’ on Holocaust - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Jewish group talking ‘foolishness’ on Holocaust
text: Ben Carson dismissed as “foolishness” a statement from the head of the Anti-Defamation League that the notion that the Holocaust could have been hindered if Jews in Nazi Germany had been allowed to have guns. Carson, a Republican presidential candidate, refused in an interview Friday on ABC’s “Good Morning America” to back down from his […] ...
